Konsonan
Consonant		 Ketik/Type h n c r k d t s w l p dh j y ny m g b th ng f v z q
Hasil/Result ꦃ ꦤ꧀ ꦕ꧀ ꦂ ꦏ꧀ ꦢ꧀ ꦠ꧀ ꦱ꧀ ꦮ꧀ ꦭ꧀ ꦥ꧀ ꦝ꧀ ꦗ꧀ ꦪ꧀ ꦚ꧀ ꦩ꧀ ꦒ꧀ ꦧ꧀ ꦛ꧀ ꦁ ꦥ꦳꧀ ꦮ꦳꧀ ꦗ꦳꧀ ꧀
Ketik/Type H N C R K D T S W L P Dh J Y M G B Th F V Z Q jny
Hasil/Result ꦃ ꦟ꧀ ꦖ꧀ ꦂ ꦑ꧀ ꦣ꧀ ꦡ꧀ ꦯ꧀ ꦦ꧀ ꦞ꧀ ꦙ꧀ ꦁ ꦓ꧀ ꦨ꧀ ꦜ꧀ ꦰ꧀ ꦐ꧀ ꦘ꧀
Nglegena Ketik/Type ha na ca ra ka da ta sa wa la pa dha ja ya nya ma ga ba tha nga fa va za rx lx lxu
Hasil/Result ꦲ ꦤ ꦕ ꦫ ꦏ ꦢ ꦠ ꦱ ꦮ ꦭ ꦥ ꦝ ꦗ ꦪ ꦚ ꦩ ꦒ ꦧ ꦛ ꦔ ꦥ꦳ ꦮ꦳ ꦗ꦳ ꦉ ꦊ ꦋ

Aksara Swara		 Ketik/Type A I U E O X a i u e o x q qr qy qrx qa qi qu qe qo qx

and Symbols		 Ketik/Type ` 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 - = [ ] \ ; ' / , .

Punctuation
and Symbols		 Ketik/Type SHIFT + ` 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 - = [ ] \ ; ' / , .
Ketik/Type ~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + { } | : " ? < >
Hasil/Result ꦳ ꦉ ꦊ ꦔ ꦚ ꦛ ꦝ ꦽ ꦾ ꦿ ꦘ ꦜ ꦘ ꧁ ꧂ ꧋ ꧇ ꧆ ꦳ special ꧞ ꧟

on all devices)		 Ketik/Type ALT + 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 Special combination nc nj
Hasil/Result ꦳ ꦴ ꦵ ꦷ ꦹ ꦻ ꦽ ꦾ ꦿ Kombinasi khusus ꦚ꧀ꦕ꧀ ꦚ꧀ꦗ꧀

More help on this keyboard

How to write down:

This is the inverse table of the tables above. You can get the output displayed on the top row (white) by typing the letters on the lower row (grey). There might be more than one way to type a character.

These are based on the complete list of Javanese Unicode block. So this table shows that you are able to write any Javanese character - in an average of 2 - keystroke using this keyboard.

ꦄ ꦅ ꦆ ꦇ ꦈ ꦉ ꦊ ꦋ ꦌ ꦍ ꦎ ꦏ ꦐ ꦑ ꦒ ꦓ ꦔ
A II I Ii O rx lx lxu E Ai O ka Qa Ka ga Ga nga
! @ kha gha #

cha ) jha $ % ) ^ +

or & 		ALT+8
or * 		ALT+9
or ( 		q
